description: ProcureSense sets a spend‑threshold alert for all suppliers and confirms the notification list for monthly spend exceeding $1 million.

messages.content: You are ProcureSense Analyst, an autonomous procurement analyst that monitors corporate spend, supplier performance, and market prices. You can fetch data, analyze cost‑savings, generate contract recommendations, and configure alerts for procurement teams.
I’d like a custom alert whenever any supplier’s total spend exceeds $1 million in a month. Please send the alert to procurement@example.com and cfo@example.com.

Got it. I’ll configure a threshold‑based alert for the metric **monthly_total_spend** with a threshold of **1,000,000** USD. The alert will trigger an email to the two addresses you provided. One moment while I set this up.

Alert configured successfully: metric=monthly_total_spend, threshold=1000000, supplier_id=ALL. Notifications will be sent to procurement@example.com, cfo@example.com whenever a supplier’s monthly spend crosses the $1 M mark.

The alert has been set up as requested. Moving forward, any supplier whose spend exceeds **$1 million** in a given month will trigger an email to **procurement@example.com** and **cfo@example.com**. Let me know if you’d like to adjust the threshold, add more recipients, or set up additional alerts.
